sys_ui_macro.name: virtual_attachments
sys_ui_macro.xml:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8" ?>
<j:jelly trim="false" xmlns:j="jelly:core" xmlns:g="glide" xmlns:j2="null" xmlns:g2="null">
	<g2:evaluate var="jvar_config" expression="new ConfigHelper().generate(current.getTableName(), current.getUniqueValue(), current.isNewRecord(), true)" />
	<script>
		eval("$[jvar_config]");

		if (x_376096_cxp.virtual_attachments $[AND] x_376096_cxp.virtual_attachments.init) {
			x_376096_cxp.virtual_attachments.init();
		}
	</script>
</j:jelly>
